alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 26 at 8:11AM MDT until October 26 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility 1/4mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County. From the Wyoming/Colorado border along the I-25 north to the Platte/Converse county line. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills
